website_summaries.verdict: Between the Daylight Noserider’s heavy-duty design, thick protective foam layers, and overall lightweight design, you couldn’t ask for a better travel bag to carry two longboards at once.
pros: Available in multiple sizes and colors
Holds up to 2 longboards at once
cons: These surfboard travel bags are a bit on the expensive side

customer_reviews.title: not as good as my older dakine bag
customer_reviews.text: only one zipper on the main compartment, so if it fails, so does the bag. should come with 2 zippers. also the opposite the handle side of the bag, the side that would touch ground if you leaned the bag against a wall, has the zipper go down half the length of the bag, this does not provide surfboard rail protection, where as the top side of the bag, the side you won't be resting it on, has rail protection. this should have been designed the other way. infact they should have added internal padding to pad between board and zipper
customer_reviews.author: basmati_riceee

customer_reviews.title: Good Bag for basic protection
customer_reviews.text: I use this day bag to transport my long board in the bed of my truck to and from the beach. The bag provides basic bump and storage protection, and it has room for your leash and other items that will not damage your board. My biggest dislike is that the bag is advertised as Heat Resistant but in reality the tarpaulin material provides very little to no heat resistant protection when my board is in the bag in the back of my truck. I found the bag more effective to heat resistance if you take the board out of the bag and lay the bag over the board and strapping it to the your tailgate rack.
customer_reviews.author: Lolo

customer_reviews.title: Great board bag!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 10’2” bag for my 10 foot longboard. I love the little bit of extra room, plus it has a great little pocket for wax and leash. It’s light weight, but just right to protect my board. A great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Darrel Larson

customer_reviews.title: This bag (I ordered a 9'6" for my 9'2") fits nicely with the fins on
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bag for my 9'2 Nolte high perf longboard. This bag (I ordered a 9'6" for my 9'2") fits nicely with the fins on. There is a bit of wiggle room left so I could leave a large fin on it. The center fin slot has a zipper on it, too. Just took it on a 1k mile road trip, it was really quiet up there. Fit is nice, material is thick enough for day to day use.
customer_reviews.author: rick m

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Airline Safe.
customer_reviews.text: Dakine has always put out a great product. Growing up here in Hawaii everyone knows that if you want something to last, you buy Dakine. This board bag fit my 9' 4" Board with enough room left to stash my soft racks for use on the rental cars, it also has a very durable handle and shoulder strap. This bag is airline safe, at least on Hawaiian Airlines it is. All I can say are good things about this bag.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 8’6” fun board perfectly. Great product at a reasonable price. Very durable & love the adjustable zip for the large back fin. Dakine trusted quality. Makes my trip down steep stairs to the beach way easier!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great longboard bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to keep a 9'2" longboard safe in a movers' truck. Was a little worried that the 9'2" bag would be too small, but it turned out to have been a perfect fit, and worked like a charm. Excellent workmanship. Very happy with this purchase, and will likely buy Dakine surfboard bags in the future.
customer_reviews.author: gcv

customer_reviews.title: Cool, very protective
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his cover. Cool and protective, fits perfectly. Came on time.
customer_reviews.author: Karen D. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: This bag is perfect for day use
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for day use. It makes toting my 9'4 or 9'5 around on trail walks super easy. I love the extra long opening; it makes it easy to get the board in and out, and it's great for resting your board on the sand without getting sand in your wax.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Duskus

customer_reviews.title: ... big guy with big boards and Dakine is the best. tossed another brand and have Dakine for ALL ...
customer_reviews.text: i have 3 surfboards and an SUP big guy with big boards and Dakine is the best. tossed another brand and have Dakine for ALL my boards great protection and durable / awesome
customer_reviews.author: Brent Cole

customer_reviews.title: Quality bag for day use
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for trips from garage to beach. Picture shows white on the camo side. Mine came as reflective silver on both sides which is much preferred to keep the board cool and the bag clean. 9’6 x 23 x 3 and plenty of room to spare in all dimensions. Highly recommend for the daily board.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag, but not the design I orderd.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, not the design I ordered. I ordered the grey and white bag and got a completely different one that they don't even offer. I'm going to keep it because it is a good bag and don't have time to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Timms

customer_reviews.title: Good price for the quality
customer_reviews.text: Fits board well and zipper seems strong. Might have enough room to wrap board in bubble wrap for travel purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel C, Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, like all Dakine bags it is high ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, like all Dakine bags it is high quality. I bought this for my wife's 7'6" NSP and it fits with a little room to spare. Bag is well padded on both sides and is silver on the inside. Shoulder strap tucks away nicely in the hidden pocket at the top of the bag. Love the white color, keeps the sun from cooking the board in the bed of my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R

customer_reviews.title: fits my NSP 9'2" longboard like a glove
customer_reviews.text: fits my NSP 9'2" longboard like a glove. They build a little bit of flex in the bag, so 9'2 works with a 9'2" even with fins on.
customer_reviews.author: M. Baird

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality day bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice day bag for my longboard.Not a travel bag, great for storing and car transport.
customer_reviews.author: NORTHBOLT

customer_reviews.title: Good tough bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, but my 8’6” has a tri fin setup and the bag won’t quite zip up all the way in back without removing the thrusters.
customer_reviews.author: James T Baker

customer_reviews.title: More than enough room!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect lightweight day bag. Unzips 1/3 of the way. 9'6" board bag easily fits my 9'8" x 23" x 3" and then some. Check out the photos
customer_reviews.author: Brandyn

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT! no complaints. Sturdy and easy to carry from vehicle to surf or garage and back. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Ignatz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent heavy duty travel bag
customer_reviews.text: Excellent heavy duty travel bag. Not quite big enough for 2 long boards though. Heavy duty zippers are great but wished they would have designed them to go all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: gntlmn5

customer_reviews.title: Bag is missing a hook for the strap
customer_reviews.text: The hook to hang the strap to hold the bag on your shoulder is missing! We need to use it and cannot return it
customer_reviews.author: donnaschiaffo

customer_reviews.title: Great Surfbag...
customer_reviews.text: It is the perfect Surfbag, it has good cushion... great price, the zipper is big, so you can pull and put in your surfboard as easy as it can be... It also comes with a very comfortable shoulder strap... and a hidden pocket for it...
customer_reviews.author: Michel F.

customer_reviews.title: Speedy delivery Rad board bag. Minimal, but does ...
customer_reviews.text: Speedy delivery Rad board bag. Minimal, but does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Braylene Jones

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Surfboard Bag
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this surfboard bag for my granddaughter's surfboard and it fit perfectly. It is well made and is built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Miller

customer_reviews.title: A great surfboard bag for the price I paid
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described. A great surfboard bag for the price I paid. It was thicker and better quality than expected.
customer_reviews.author: brian egan

customer_reviews.title: DAKINE makes the best air travel bags for surfboards
customer_reviews.text: DAKINE makes the best air travel bags for surfboards. I have at least 8 DAKINE surfboard bags including the famous coffin for long boards.
customer_reviews.author: Kirometoru

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my board. Shoulder strap may carrying much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Christoph J Pade

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good unless that you cannot turn it over to dry it
customer_reviews.author: Laetitia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bag! I think I'd have way more dings on board without this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Better bag to go with
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a excellent product Stod the test of a 6000 kilometer drive on the side of the camper Nice to put a old bed sheet over the board to keep the wax of the inside of the bag Makes for easy in and out. Love the extra pockets and strap storage pocket
customer_reviews.author: gringobruce

product_meta.title: Dakine Surf Daylight Noserider Bag
product_meta.description: The Dakine Surf Daylight Nose rider bag features a padded shoulder strap, heavy duty, corrosion proof, wrap around zipper and wax/fin pocket.
feature_bullets: Heat and water resistant tarpaulin material
Padded shoulder strap with stash pocket
